item.full: New features, improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.5.5.1392 released

item.heading: Version 2.5.4.1389 released

item.full: Relationship columns are sometimes mismatched when the primary key has multiple columns. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.5.4.1388 released

item.full: Fix: A saved project opens and appears empty when it contains views with keys. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.5.2.1383 released
item.full: Added new validation rule to check that lazy properties belong to a lazy entity. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.5.1.1381 released
item.snippet: Improved performance of database sync for Oralce and PostgreSql
item.full: Improved performance of database sync for Oracle and PostgreSql databases. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.5.0.1379 released
item.snippet: Fix: Database update script templates not included in base install.
item.full: Fix: Database update script templates not included in base install. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.5.0.1377 released
item.snippet: Added (beta) support for updating the database from the model.
item.full: Added support for creating database update scripts from the model. Only SQL Server is supported at this time. Support for other databases will be added soon. Please note: this functionality is still regarded as beta - let us know what needs to be improved! See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.19.1376 released
item.full: Added support for 'order-by' to collections. See full Release Notes.

item.full: Fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.full: Various fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.full: Various improvements. See full Release Notes.

item.full: Saving and loading selected files in generation screen causing errors. See full Release Notes.

item.full: Added feature to remember selected (checked) files on the generation screen between runs. See full Release Notes.

item.full: Blog post on NHForge about creating and editing templates.

item.heading: Version 2.4.9.1327 released
item.snippet: Improved the displaying of the error grid on the Templates tab.
item.full: Improved the displaying of the error grid on the Templates tab. Select the Sharp Architecture template on the Templates tab. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.8.1325 released
item.full: Added Sharp Architecture template (beta). Select the Sharp Architecture template on the Templates tab. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.7.1322 released
item.full: Some new features in the template system. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.7.1319 released
item.snippet: Better handling of m:m relationships where one side is also part of a m:m relationship.
item.full: Better handling of m:m relationships where one side is also part of a m:m relationship. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.7.1317 released
item.full: Improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.7.1316 released
item.full: Improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.7.1312 released
item.full: New features and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.6.1307 released
item.full: A few improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.6.1304 released
item.snippet: Added ability to specify uni-directional references.
item.full: Added ability to specify uni-directional references. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.6.1303 released
item.snippet: Collection cascade values and property access value written to HBM files incorrectly.
item.full: Collection cascade values and property access value written to HBM files incorrectly. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.6.1301 released
item.snippet: UnauthorizedAccessException when the output folder has read-only files.
item.full: UnauthorizedAccessException when the output folder has read-only files. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.6.1299 released
item.snippet: Default values for the 'Access', 'Cascade', 'Lazy' attributes for properties can now be set at project-level and at entity-level.
item.full: Default values for the 'Access', 'Cascade', 'Lazy' attributes for properties can now be set at project-level and at entity-level. They can be overridden at entity-level and property-level. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.5.1298 released
item.snippet: Problems connecting to Oracle, PostgreSql, and MySQL databases.
item.full: Problems connecting to Oracle, PostgreSql, and MySQL databases. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.5.1297 released
item.full: Many new features. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.4.1288 released
item.snippet: HBM and Fluent mappings incorrect for self-referencing entities.
item.full: HBM and Fluent mappings incorrect for self-referencing entities. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.4.1286 released
item.full: A few fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.4.1284 released
item.full: Added support for NHibernate 3.0. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.3.1283 released
item.full: Added support for PostgreSQL sequences - to ensure that the correct NHibernate Generator is specified for an entity. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.2.1277 released

item.full: Three fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.full: Error on start-up when some database script settings have been modified. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.2.1265 released
item.full: Added support for database views. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.1.1260 released
item.full: When selecting an entity to add as a reference, entities that were already referenced using a different mapped relationship were not displayed to be selected. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.1.1259 released
item.snippet: References and mapped tables are now listed alphabetically in the diagrammer.
item.full: References and mapped tables are now listed alphabetically in the diagrammer. See full Release Notes.

item.full: When importing changes from the database, changes to the database field type are not applied to existing mapped properties. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.0.1252 released
item.full: A few small improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.4.0.1250 released
item.full: A few small improvements. See full Release Notes.

item.full: Occasional error when clicking on the validation results grid. See full Release Notes.

item.full: References deleted via the diagrammer do not get deleted correctly. See full Release Notes.

item.full: DateTime parse error on non-English machines. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Full-version launched
item.full: Visual NHibernate finally released! The beta period is now finished. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1234 released

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1231 released
item.full: Error when importing an existing VS project and a config file is found, but it doesn't contain NHibernate settings. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1230 released
item.full: Various fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1228 released
item.full: Improvements to the inheritance diagram. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1226 released
item.full: Error when importing database changes that include a new relationship on an association table. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1225 released
item.snippet: Fix for scrolling issues in diagrams
item.full: Fix for scrolling issues in diagrams. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1223 released
item.snippet: Fix for high CPU usage on diffs
item.full: Fix for high CPU usage on diffs. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1221 released
item.full: Fix for error when analysing files during re-generation, when a code file contains nullable types. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1220 released
item.full: Improvements to unmapping of tables. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1217 released
item.full: Added ability to merge entities that are mapped 1:1 or m:1. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1216 released
item.full: Added ability to delete components. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1214 released
item.full: Virtual primary keys can be add to a table or an entity. The changes will get propagated both ways. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1213 released
item.full: Orphaned mappings were being serialized and throwing exceptions. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1212 released
item.full: Fix for loading existing projects. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1210 released
item.full: For for a special case of m:n relationships. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1209 released
item.full: Various fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.10.1207 released
item.full: Added templates to control how entities and properties are named when starting from an existing database. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.9.1205 released
item.snippet: Fix: Existing projects not loading correctly
item.full: Fix: Existing projects not loading correctly. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.9.1204 released
item.full: Improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.9.1203 released
item.full: Improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.9.1201 released
item.full: Many new inheritance features and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.8.1198 released
item.full: Fixed occasional error when IntelliMerge is merging into existing source code files. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.8.1197 released
item.full: Added support for all three types of inheritance. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1192 released
item.full: Fix for SQL server and SQL Server Express collation-related issue. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1190 released
item.full: Various improvements to the database synchronization feature. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1189 released
item.full: Many improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1187 released
item.snippet: Improved support for Map and IDBag collections
item.full: Improved support for Map and IDBag collections. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1184 released
item.full: Improved error reporting to enable saving error report as a file which can be emailed to Slyce. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1182 released
item.full: Added support for SQL Server 2000. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1180 released
item.full: Database synchronization feature to import changes from the database and apply them to the model. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1176 released
item.full: Fix for 'License not valid due to the problems with dotConnect Universal installation' error. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.7.1175 released
item.snippet: Added encoding selector to each template file
item.full: Added encoding selector to each template file. Other fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.6.1172 released
item.full: Added the ability to import Fluent NHibernate projects. Now you can visualize and edit your Fluent NHibernate projects. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.5.1168 released
item.full: Fix: Error on the Options screen when changing the Default Cascade type. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.4.1167 released
item.full: Moved to .Net 4.0. Many other improcements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.3.1160 released
item.full: A few more fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.2.1155 released
item.full: A few fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.1.1154 released
item.full: Fix for DirectoryNotFound error. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.3.0.1153 released
item.full: Visual NHibernate now has an advanced templating engine. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.19.1129 released
item.full: Added support for specifying table and columns prefixes to be removed. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.18.1126 released
item.snippet: Select schemas and tables when importing.
item.full: Added ability to select schemas and tables when importing, plus many other improvements. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.17.1120 released
item.full: Many improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.16.1116 released
item.full: Fixed problem with opening a saved SQL Server Express project. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.15.1115 released
item.snippet: Fixes for SQL Server multiple schemas.
item.full: Fixes for working with SQL Server databases with multiple schemas having duplicate table-names. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Videos added to website
item.snippet: First video added to the website.
item.full: We have created our first video. More will be added over the next few days and weeks. It shows how to create an NHibernate project from an existing database. Watch it here.

item.heading: Version 2.2.14.1113 released
item.full: Add custom code to entity classes: using statements, attributes, base-names (implements and base-class names), properties, methods. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.13.1108 released
item.full: Many improvements to the output for Fluent NHibernate, also many other fixes and imrpovements. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.12.1102 released
item.full: When a database is selected in a blank project, then 'Refresh Schema' is clicked, the entities are auto-created. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.11.1100 released
item.full: Added support for the various ID generator schemes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.10.1099 released
item.full: Added support for Firebird databases. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.9.1098 released
item.full: Fixed support for SQL Server Express. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.8.1096 released
item.full: New features added to make working with association tables easier and more powerful. (m:n relationships). See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.7.1094 released
item.full: Added support for PostgreSQL. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.6.1091 released
item.full: Added ability to create new (virtual) relationships between tables. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Store launched with 30% beta discount
item.snippet: Online store is live with 30% beta discount
item.full: Today we launched the online store where you can buy licenses for Visual NHibernate. We are offering a 30% discount on ALL purchases during the beta period. Check it out here.

item.heading: Version 2.2.5.1087 released
item.snippet: Fix: sporadic error when displaying validation grid
item.full: An occasional error can occur when displaying validation results in the grid. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.4.1086 released
item.full: Improved naming algorithm and many fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.3.1083 released
item.full: Added support for Oracle. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.2.1081 released
item.full: Some SQL Server data-types not handled correctly. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.2.1.1080 released
item.full: Added support for MySQL. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: New screenshots
item.snippet: New screenshots added to the website
item.full: New screenshots of version 2.2.0.1078 have been added to the screenshots page. See: new screenshots!.

item.heading: Version 2.2.0.1078 released
item.full: Many big fixes and improvements in this release. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.1.2.1072 released
item.snippet: Open existing VS projects with missing NH config file
item.full: Added ability to select an NHibernate config file that is not in the current project when starting from an existing Visual Studio project. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.1.1.1065 released
item.full: An error occurs when generating new files. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.1.0.1063 released
item.full: All files that are different to files on your disk are displayed so you can see the changes before writing them to disk. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.15.1054 released
item.snippet: Fixes for NH config section handling in existing projects
item.full: Fixes for NH config section handling in existing projects. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.14.1053 released
item.full: Many improvements and fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.13.1047 released
item.full: Added option to generate Fluent NHibernate mappings. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.12.1032 released
item.snippet: Fixed error when setting output folder
item.full: Error when setting output folder. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.11.1031 released
item.snippet: Added support for many NHibernate features
item.full: Added support for many NHibernate features, such as lazy-loading, dynamic-insert, dynamic-update and others. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.10.1026 released
item.full: Added ability to turn a composite primary key into a component. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version RSS feed
item.snippet: RSS feed added for new version announcements
item.full: We have added an RSS feed to notify you about when new versions of Visual NHibernate are released, as well as other related news. See the Release Notes page or the Downloads page for the link.

item.heading: Version 2.0.9.1018 released
item.snippet: Many-to-many association tables suppressed in entity model.
item.full: Improved handling of many-to-many relationships, optional private property setters. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Screenshots added
item.snippet: Screenshots of Visual NHibernate have been added to the website.
item.full: Various screenshots of Visual NHibernate have been added to the website.

item.heading: Version 2.0.8.1007 released
item.snippet: Improved handling of existing VS projects
item.full: Improved import from existing Visual Studio NHibernate projects. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.7.1005 released
item.full: Improved pluralisation of references between entities. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.6.1001 released
item.full: Added code-insertions to work with existing code. Also added NHibernate Validator support. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.5.983 released
item.snippet: Added reverse engineering of existing NHibernate projects.
item.full: Reverse engineering of existing NHibernate projects, and a start on database migration support. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.4.977 released
item.full: Fixed the update checker, as well as some UI fixes and improvements. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.3.974 released
item.full: Added support for entity-first modeling, as well as many small fixes and improvements. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.2.967 released
item.full: Improvements to model manipulation, and a fix for error when clicking a table relationship in the database diagram. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Version 2.0.1.963 released
item.snippet: New features and small UI fixes.
item.full: New version includes user-requested features such as bytecode generator selection and auto-completion for property types, as well as many small UI fixes. See full Release Notes.

item.heading: Beta is launched
item.full: Today, Slyce Software Limited launched Visual NHibernate. This is the first visual modelling tool for NHibernate projects that makes the full power of NHibernate available to developers. All of NHibernate's complex mapping scenarios can be modelled in Visual NHibernate.
